actions.text: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment increases funding for land acquisition and acqisition of lands for national forests special acts by $5 million offset by a reduction in funds of $5 million from environmental programs and management accounts.
purpose: An amendment to increase funding for land acquisition by $2.5 million and to increase funding for acquisition of lands for national forests special acts by $2.5 million offset by a reduction in funds of $5 million from environmental programs and management accounts.
